original: sthānaṃ praveśo rūpaṃ ca lakṣaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca /
analyzed: sthānam praveśaḥ rūpam ca lakṣam lakṣaṇam eva ca

original: utthāpanaṃ bodhanaṃ ca cakraviśrāmameva ca // SomSv_1
analyzed: utthāpanam bodhanam ca cakra viśrāmam eva ca
bhūmikā gamanam ca eva anta avasthā tathā eva ca
viśrāmaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ca tathā āgamanam eva ca
iti trayodaśavidham śāktam vijñānam uttamam

original: sarveṣu trikaśāstreṣu sūcitaṃ śambhunā svayam // SomSv_3
analyzed: sarveṣu trika śāstreṣu sūcitam śambhunā svayam
nābhi adhas ṅgulāḥ pañca meḍhrasya ūrdhva aṅgula dvayam

original: tanmadhye kandanāmā ca cakrasthānamiti smṛtam // SomSv_4
analyzed: tad madhye kanda nāmā ca cakra sthānam iti smṛtam
prāṇa apāna nirodhena manaḥ tatra eva niḥkṣipet

original: samyag vāyugatiṃ jitvā yāvan madhyagatāṃ nayet // SomSv_5
analyzed: samyak vāyu gatim jitvā yāvat madhya gatām nayet somsu

original: eṣa praveśa ity āhū rūpaṃ vakṣyāmi cādhunā /
analyzed: eṣa praveśaḥ iti āhuḥ rūpam vakṣyāmi ca adhunā

original: śṛṅgāṭakanibhaṃ cakraṃ ṣaḍaraṃ cāparaṃ dhruvam // SomSv_6
analyzed: śṛṅgāṭaka nibham cakram ṣaṣ aram ca aparam dhruvam
dāḍimī kusuma prakhyam kandam vai jāti lohitam
etat rūpam samākhyātam tṛtīyam cintana ātmakam

original: tanmadhye nikṣipec cittaṃ yāvat tatra sthirīkṛtam /
analyzed: tad madhye nikṣipet cittam yāvat tatra sthirīkṛtam

original: tyaktaruddho yadā vāyustadā lakṣaṃ vinirdiśet // SomSv_8
analyzed: tyakta ruddhaḥ yadā vāyuḥ tadā lakṣam vinirdiśet
kanda cakrasya madhya sthā tu anāhata mayī kalā
adhas ūrdhve rekhā saṃyuktā bhujaṃga kuṭila ākṛtiḥ
ūrdhva adhas vasthita avasthā sūryācandramasau ubhau
satyam virājamānā sā sahasra arka sama prabhā
tām eva ālokayet śaktim manāk kumbhaka vṛttinā

original: etal lakṣaṇam uddiṣṭam utthāpanam ataḥ param // SomSv_11
analyzed: etat lakṣaṇam uddiṣṭam utthāpanam atas param
juṣat recaka vṛttyā tu mantram ca eva samuccaret
prabuddhām cintayet śaktim daṇḍa vat parameśvarīm
ādhāra madhyāt āyātā suṣumnā mārgam āśritā
utthāpanam samākhyātam bodhanam paratas tathā

original: kandastho vedhayen nābhiṃ tato hṛtsthaṃ pitāmaham /
analyzed: kanda sthaḥ vedhayet nābhim tatas hṛd stham pitāmaham
kaṇṭha stham acyutam sākṣāt rudram tālu tale sthitam
bhruvoḥ madhya gatam tu īśam brahmadvāre sadāśivam

original: bodhayitvā vrajed āśu padaṃ cānāśritaṃ śivam // SomSv_15
analyzed: bodhayitvā vrajet āśu padam ca anāśritam śivam
etat bodhanam uddiṣṭam cakra viśrāmaṇam tatas

original: svābhāvikaṃ dalaṃ dīptaṃ dravaṃ sthiranabhopamam // SomSv_16
analyzed: svābhāvikam dalam dīptam dravam sthira nabha upamam

original: amṛtaṃ śekharaṃ caiva śaktirbrahmā tathaiva ca /
analyzed: amṛtam śekharam ca eva śaktiḥ brahmā tathā eva ca

original: bindunādaṃ tathā proktaṃ cakradvādaśakaṃ kila // SomSv_17
analyzed: bindu nādam tathā proktam cakra dvādaśakam kila
vedhayantī kramāt śaktiḥ cakre cakre pratikṣaṇam

original: viśramet sā mahādevī cakraviśrāma uttamaḥ // SomSv_18
analyzed: viśramet sā mahādevī cakra viśrāmaḥ uttamaḥ
hṛdayam kampate pūrvam tāluka dvāram eva ca
śiraḥ ca bhramate tasya dṛṣṭi saṃkrānti lakṣaṇam
ekaikam bhramayati aṅgam aṅga pratyaṅga saṃdhiṣu
ghūrṇate hṛdayam ca asya samyak vidyā prabhāvataḥ

original: yāni yāni vikārāṇi avasthā kurute sataḥ /
analyzed: yāni yāni vikārāṇi avasthā kurute sataḥ

original: teṣu teṣu na bhetavyaṃ krīḍati parameśvarī // SomSv_21
analyzed: teṣu teṣu na bhetavyam krīḍati parameśvarī

original: amṛte seyam unmattā vikārān kurute bahūn /
analyzed: amṛte sā iyam unmattā vikārān kurute bahūn
mala traya vikārau bahu janmasu yat kṛtam
dhunoti sa malān pāśāt para śakti samutthitān
bhūmikā gamanam proktam anta avasthā tathā ucyate

original: yat saṃkrāntau romaharṣo 'srupāto jṛmbhārambho gadgadā gīr giro 'ntaḥ /
analyzed: yat saṃkrāntau romaharṣaḥ sru pātaḥ jṛmbha ārambhaḥ gadgadāḥ gīḥ giraḥ ntar

original: granthisphoṭaḥ sparśadivyapraharṣo binduspandā nābhikandāt sphuranti // SomSv_24
analyzed: granthi sphoṭaḥ sparśa divya praharṣaḥ bindu spandāḥ nābhi kandāt sphuranti
anta avasthā samākhyātā viśrāmaḥ tu adhunā ucyate
nābhi cakra viniryātā yadā śaktiḥ prabudhyate

original: tadā tv astamitaṃ sarvamakṣagrāmaṃ bahiḥ sthitam /
analyzed: tadā tu astamitam sarvam akṣa grāmam bahis sthitam

original: yadā sā paramā śaktiḥ sulīnā parame pade // SomSv_26
analyzed: yadā sā paramā śaktiḥ su līnā parame pade

original: tadā na vindate kiṃcid viṣayī viṣayāntaram /
analyzed: tadā na vindate kiṃcid viṣayī viṣaya antaram

original: śive viśrāmyate śaktistadā viśrāma ucyate // SomSv_27
analyzed: śive viśrāmyate śaktiḥ tadā viśrāmaḥ ucyate
yatra viśramaṇam śakteḥ manaḥ tatra layam vrajet
tadā ātmā paramātma tve jñātavyaḥ niścita ātmabhiḥ

original: śivībhūto bhavatyātmā pariṇāmaḥ sa eva hi /
analyzed: śivībhūtaḥ bhavati ātmā pariṇāmaḥ saḥ eva hi

original: sadā sa varṣate divyam amṛtaṃ jantujīvanam // SomSv_29
analyzed: sadā sa varṣate divyam amṛtam jantu jīvanam

original: cittaṃ tatra tu saṃdhārya punardaivī viśettu sā /
analyzed: cittam tatra tu saṃdhārya punar daivī viśet tu sā

original: tadā tv āgamanaṃ proktamevaṃ samyak trayodaśa // SomSv_30
analyzed: tadā tu āgamanam proktam evam samyak trayodaśa
